text: How to get Deal paid via Stripe???  I'm not sure if I'm just dumb or HubSpot is not just well documented for developers.  I'm really confused.  Hope you can help.
Hello everyone! I am a front-end developer! :slightly_smiling_face: new to HubSpot..

Hello everyone! I'm a dev/designer about to build my company's new site in HubSpot. Excited to get going! Developing a local dev workflow using Codekit, Transmit, GitHub Desktop and HubL Local Server so it's easier with a GUI for non-devs to edit. Been interesting. The HubL local server is really finicky.
Hi! I´m Miguel I´m onboarding on HubSpot Agency´s program and I want to learn as much as I can from all of you! Thanks in advance for all the knowledge you have here!:star-struck:

Welcome <@UHE8JR508> - we're really excited to have you a part of our community!

Sounds like you're getting setup :grinning: - for local development, the <#CBZK16L9L|ftp-feedback> is an awesome place to collaborate and ask questions related to local dev.

Also, make sure to check this out: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Can-you-setup-local-development-on-HubSpot-CMS/td-p/199430>
Welcome <@UHESZLHFX> - we are excited to have you in the community :slightly_smiling_face: :smiley:
Hi <@UH6BLCNJV>, welcome to the community. We're really happy you're a part of our group :smiley::raised_hands:

hey <@UHGTV70FQ> - welcome to our :sprocket:community!! We're super excited to have you in our community.

How has the HubSpot experience been so far? :slightly_smiling_face:
Excited to have you in our community <@UHG1QMM46> - welcome! :sprocket::clapping:

You're definitely not dumb <@UH8EXSKSN> :slightly_smiling_face:  Check these out and see if they are helpful

> - <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/deals/how-do-i-use-the-stripe-integration-with-HubSpot>
> - <https://www.HubSpot.com/integrations/stripe>
> - <https://stripe.com/works-with/HubSpot>


If those don't help, you can call into the support line and get help from a HubSpotter on the line.

Lastly, you could try and post in the CRM form, as those folks are much more involved in the deals/sales world: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CRM-Sales-Hub/ct-p/sales>

Welcome <@UH8GKEWBB> - we're happy to have you a part of our community :bmo::clapping::hamsterdance:

How has your HubSpot CMS experience been so far?

Also - Have you checked out this: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/discoverykit> ?
Welcome <@UHK9GR3BQ> - We're excited to have you in the CMS Developer slack and in the HubSpot Partner Program. :slightly_smiling_face: Lots to learn!

Hi <@U22PKFRU5> , thank you very much. I'll definitely check those links you provided.  Btw, I'm just doing this research for my company.  I cannot suggest anything until I've tried myself and uncovering the gotchas like what I'm just about to mention.  Having said that I'm mostly on the free account and apparently the 'quote' feature is only available in the Pro version of HubSpot Sales.
